property.name: isValid
property.shortdesc: Returns true if the object specifier resolves to valid objects.

property.name: parent
property.shortdesc: The parent of the FindChangeGradientFeatherSetting (a FindChangeTransparencySetting, FindChangeStrokeTransparencySetting, FindChangeFillTransparencySetting or FindChangeContentTransparencySetting).

property.name: opacityGradientStops
property.shortdesc: A collection of opacity gradient stops.

property.name: applied
property.shortdesc: If true, the gradient feather effect is applied. Can return: Boolean or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: type
property.shortdesc: The type of gradient. Can return: GradientType enumerator or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: angle
property.shortdesc: The angle of the gradient feather. Can return: Real (-180 - 180) or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: length
property.shortdesc: The length of the axial gradient, or radius of the radial gradient. Can return: Unit or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: gradientStart
property.shortdesc: The center point (for a radial gradient) or starting point (for a linear gradient) applied to the fill, as page coordinates in the format [x, y]. Can return: Array of 2 Units or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: hiliteAngle
property.shortdesc: The hilite angle of the radial gradient feather. Can return: Real or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: hiliteLength
property.shortdesc: The hilite length of the radial gradient feather. Can return: Unit or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: properties
property.shortdesc: A property that allows setting of several properties at the same time.

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the FindChangeGradientFeatherSetting.

method.name: getElements
method.shortdesc: Resolves the object specifier, creating an array of object references.

parameters.name: handler
parameters.shortdesc: The event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.

parameters.name: handler
parameters.shortdesc: The registered event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.
